channel.title: The Purpose of this Board
channel.description:
This is the newest board in RuneScape development, and it has a simple purpose - discussing everything about RuneScape private servers. Here are some examples of topics you might find, or want to post:
- What is the best way to handle donations? - How can I fix my game economy? - What do you look for in a server? - What do you think of this idea for custom server content: _____?
Those are just a few very broad examples. Post what you would like to, but [b]please refrain from posting about specific servers[/b]. That counts as advertising and you should post advertisements [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/board,221.0.html]Here[/url].
~Lin
